title: Remove custom domain configuration and use default Caffeine URL only

requirements.text: Remove all custom-domain canonical behavior so the app is no longer tied to `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` and can be used normally on the default URL `https://myrepublic-tuk.caffeine.xyz`. Update `frontend/index.html` to (1) remove the pre-load canonical redirect script that forces `myrepubicnetwork.web.id`, and (2) set the `<link rel='canonical'>` and `og:url` values to `https://myrepublic-tuk.caffeine.xyz`.

quotes: iya saya ingin proyek tanpa domain,  tetap memakai link default: https://myrepublic-tuk.caffeine.xyz

acceptanceCriteria: Opening the app on any hostname (e.g., an `*.icp0.io` gateway URL or the default Caffeine URL) does not redirect to `myrepubicnetwork.web.id`.

requirements.text: Remove the IC custom domain allowlist file for `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` by deleting `frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains` (or ensuring it no longer includes `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` or `www.myrepubicnetwork.web.id`) so the frontend canister is not configured to serve that custom domain.

quotes: iya saya ingin proyek tanpa domain,  tetap memakai link default: https://myrepublic-tuk.caffeine.xyz

acceptanceCriteria: The built frontend assets do not include an `/.well-known/ic-domains` file that lists `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` or `www.myrepubicnetwork.web.id`.
No project configuration remains that explicitly enables serving `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` via the IC gateway.

requirements.text: Remove custom-domain documentation from the repository by deleting `frontend/docs/custom-domain.md` (or replacing it with a brief note stating the project uses the default Caffeine URL only: `https://myrepublic-tuk.caffeine.xyz`).

quotes: iya saya ingin proyek tanpa domain,  tetap memakai link default: https://myrepublic-tuk.caffeine.xyz

acceptanceCriteria: There is no documentation instructing users to configure or register `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` for this project.
If any replacement documentation remains, it clearly states the app is used via `https://myrepublic-tuk.caffeine.xyz` and does not include ICP gateway registration/DNS steps.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose components instead).
Do not edit immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
Backend remains single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not change or reset Cloudflare/DNS settings (out of scope; user asked to change project configuration only).
Do not register or deregister domains with the ICP gateway (external action).
Do not delete or modify IC canisters or on-chain state.
